TALKUS: Want to talk to us about your project?

SPLASH.MISSION: We are dedicated to helping businesses succeed with full stack javascript through strategic consulting and support.

HOME.UNDERLINE: We carry out IT consultancy assignments and we develop your strategic applications... In the javascript way.

NOSQL.P: NoSQL databases, like MongoDB, the leading solution, evolve businesses to be more agile, cost effective and perfectly scalable to satisfy big data needs.

DATAVISUALIZATION.P: Data is the new oil, D3 the solution to enlighten your web applications, reports, financial dashboard and quant tools in a HTML5 manner.

FRONTEND.P: Today's HTML5 framework like AngularJS provides a robust set of features for building single and multi-page web applications extraordinarily expressive, readable, and quick to develop.

BACKEND.P: Node.js is a platform built on Google's JavaScript runtime for easily building fast, scalable, cost effective network applications, capable of delivering better results than existing web framwork or legacy application server.

CONSULTING.P: You want to benefit from Full Stack Javascript solutions with some guidances ? We will help you to turn your ideas into reality, thanks to the pertinence and the expertise of its consultants.

SPLASH.CATCH: We offer you solutions that really work
SPLASH.MISSION: We rely on Open Source and Javascript technologies to bring you efficient and powerful Information Systems which make the difference in your business.

CONSULTING.H: Our mission is to bring you outstanding tools that let you win your business challenges and upscale your activity faster and safer.
CONSULTING.P: We strongly believe in Javascript and Open Source to bring your ideas to life.

CONTENT.P1:
Relying on open source allow us to always be on the cutting edge of the latest tools, frameworks, and libraries.

We are able to build highly-maintainable software with a focus on solving domain problems instead of reinventing wheels.
CONTENT.P2:
You want benefit from latest Javascript technologies such as MongoDB, NodeJS, AngularJS and D3JS without taking any risk ?

We are here for you.

We can advice you, guide you to your next successful business solution.
CONTENT.P3:
We are experienced.

Since we account more than 30 years crafting information systems in the finance sector, included 20 in management among key players, we know what matters.

This expertise could be yours.

LIST.P: Our engineers can work on-site or by contract to fulfill your needs and make your vision a reality.
